nodes.bodyText: We should not update/remove the older changeset.
These changes were reverted as part of 0e4eba7 commit

For the changeset id, can we follow the convention we had earlier for dbdeploy migrations,
[release][migration_count]_[description]
2006001_remove_data_sharing_settings_table
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: Make sense, will add a fix.
